attribute_requirements.description: Descriptive styles common to swimwear. Style terms specific to the bottom half of swimwear appear under the Underpant/Swim Bottom Style attribute.
The type of fastener used to keep an item closed and to facilitate putting on the item.

summary: The document outlines mandatory attributes for women's swimwear product types, emphasizing the essential requirements for 'Swimsuit Style' and 'Closure Type' to ensure compliance with the style guide.
